rules.name: Ghost Razor
rules.description: All successful invulnerable and Damage Mitigation saves must be re-rolled against wounds from this weapon.

infoLinks.name: And They Shall Know No Fear

rules.name: The Big Guns never Tire
rules.description: In lieu of firing his Heavy Flamer, Huron may call down an Orbital Bombardment once per game. This may be fired even if he moved and may be fired at a different unit than what his unit has shot at and will not stop his unit from charging in the following Assault Phase. It may not be fired as part of a Reaction.

rules.name: Living Legend
rules.description: An army which includes Lugft Huron as its Warlord may add +1 to the seize the initiative roll. In addition, any unit with Chapter Tactics (Astral Claws), Maelstrom Warder or Emboldened Masses Special Rules within 12" of Lugft Huron may use his leadership (applying leadership modifiers as normal).

rules.name: Shadowed Fate
rules.description: The first time Huron would be removed as a casualty for any reason, leave him on his side on the table where this has happened. Roll a D6 at the beginning of his controlling players next turn, on a 2+ he instead survives with one wound remaining and is placed back in play as close to where he fell as possible.

infoLinks.name: And They Shall Know No Fear

rules.name: The Tyrant's Champion
rules.description: Corien Sumatris, may be included as part of a detachment also containing Lugft Huron, ignoring the Limitation of the Few and the Proud Special Rule. Corien Sumatris and any unit with the Chapter Tactics (Astral Claws) Special rule that he joins gains both the Furious Charge (1) Special rule and +1 WS to their Weapon Skill (Note, this has NOT been applied to his profile above).

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.$text: The Indynabula Array allows Valthex to make up to 2 Battlesmith rolls a turn, he may also choose to re-roll any failed Battlesmith Rolls, as well as affording him a 5+ Invulnerable save. It may be used in close combat.

infoLinks.name: And They Shall Know No Fear

rules.name: Battle Alchemy
rules.description: If Valthex is present in an army then both he and a chosen Infantry unit with the Chapter Tactics (Astral Claws) may upgrade their bolt guns, bolt pistols, Combi-bolters, or Storm Bolters to use Hellfire rounds at no cost. All such upgraded weapons gain the Poison (2+) Special Rule.

rules.name: Bolster Defences
rules.description: Aer deployment, but before Scout redeployments and Infiltrate deployments, nominate one piece of terrain in your deployment zone (this cannot be one you have purchased as part of your army). The terrain piece’s cover save is increased by 1 for the duration of the game (to a maximum of 3+).

infoLinks.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
